thread.title: Kim Smith
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Kim Smith

author: Kim Smith
title: Kim Smith
text: I have limited knowledge when it comes to computers, so when my computer started acting strange, not doing what it was supposed to do, I had no idea what to do to fix it. Luckily I came across Driver Support. I purchased it ( which was very affordable), downloaded it, and that was it. Driver Support fixed my problems. Things are running smooth and efficient now. Thank YOU!!!!
